page.title: 09A weekend-Bobby Kenney
page.content: I am a sixty-two year old storeman from Balornock,Glasgow.Here is an account of how I spent the weekend of{ {17th to 19th May 1985.}On Friday the 17th I left my house at 6.30pm with my wife to go to the C.Y.C.This stands for Christian Youth Centre and is a youth club I help to run in my local church.I do various crafts eg nail pictures and woodwork with boys aged between 11 and 16.On Saturday I went into town to do some shopping.I also visited Glasgow's famous market"The Barras".In the evening I stayed at home and relaxed in front of the tele- vision.On Sunday morning I went to church and in the afternoon I visited my son and his wife as it was my grand -daughter's 5th birthday.She opened her presents and then we had a special birthday tea.We returned home at 10pm and watched T.V. before bed at 11.30.
